name: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action

files.game: N/A: Please select the .zip install file downloaded from itch.io

execute.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
files:
- game: 'N/A: Please select the .zip install file downloaded from itch.io'
- unzip: http://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Game/runner
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: unzip
- execute:
    args: $game -d "$GAMEDIR" "linux_content/*"
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Game
    src: $GAMEDIR/linux_content
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/Game/runner
